Uses of Interface
playn.core.Canvas.Drawable

    • Uses of Canvas.Drawable in playn.core

      Classes in playn.core that implement Canvas.Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Image
      Bitmapped image data.
      static class  Image.Region
      A region of an image which can be rendered to Canvases and turned into a texture (which is a Tile of the original image's texture).
      class  ImageImpl
      An implementation detail.
      Methods in playn.core with parameters of type Canvas.Drawable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Canvas Canvas.draw(Canvas.Drawable image, float x, float y)
      Draws image at the specified location (x, y).
      Canvas Canvas.draw(Canvas.Drawable image, float x, float y, float w, float h)
      Draws a scaled image at the specified location (x, y) size (w x h).
      Canvas Canvas.draw(Canvas.Drawable image, float dx, float dy, float dw, float dh, float sx, float sy, float sw, float sh)
      Draws a subregion of a image (sw x sh) @ (sx, sy) at the specified size (dw x dh) and location (dx, dy).
      Canvas Canvas.drawCentered(Canvas.Drawable image, float x, float y)
      Draws image centered at the specified location.
